name: Indian-Inspired Egg Salad
author: USA WEEKEND columnist Pam Anderson
summary: Unexpected Indian flavorings take this favorite to an appealing new place. Eat with pita chips, bread, or carrot sticks.
ingredients: ½ small red onion, in small dice
6  hard-cooked eggs, peeled and cut into large dice
1 small tomato, cut into small dice
directions: Heat oil in a non-stick skillet over medium-high heat
Saute onion until tender, about 4 minutes
Add jalapeno, ginger, turmeric and cayenne; saute until fragrant, about 1 minute
Add eggs, stirring constantly to blend flavors, about 2 minutes
Off heat, stir in tomato, cilantro, and salt
Serve warm, at room temperature or chilled
